Description.Text: Pets are not permitted in the complex. Towels and bedclothes are not included in the price. It is possible to hire bedclothes from reception for an additional fee per week (to be paid on arrival). A deposit must also be paid on arrival.

The apartment complex comprises several buildings, all with lift access. There is also a TV room and a laundrette. Those arriving by car may take advantage of the parking spaces and garage facilities (for an additional fee).
